Class Kinematics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.engineering.robotics.Kinematics
public class Kinematics extends Object
Robotics kinematics calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Method
    Description
    static double
    cubicTrajectory(double t, double totalTime, double startPos, double endPos)
    Cubic polynomial trajectory. θ(t) = a0 + a1*t + a2*t² + a3*t³ With zero velocity at start and end.

  • Constructor Details

    • Kinematics

      public Kinematics()

  • Method Details

    • forwardKinematics2Link

      public static double[] forwardKinematics2Link(double L1, double L2, double theta1, double theta2)
      2D forward kinematics for 2-link planar arm.
      Parameters:
      L1 - Length of link 1
      L2 - Length of link 2
      theta1 - Angle of joint 1 (radians)
      theta2 - Angle of joint 2 (radians, relative to link 1)
      Returns:
      [x, y] position of end effector

    • inverseKinematics2Link

      public static double[] inverseKinematics2Link(double L1, double L2, double x, double y)
      2D inverse kinematics for 2-link planar arm.
      Parameters:
      L1 - Length of link 1
      L2 - Length of link 2
      x - Target x position
      y - Target y position
      Returns:
      [theta1, theta2] joint angles (radians), or null if unreachable

    • dhMatrix

      public static double[][] dhMatrix(double theta, double d, double a, double alpha)
      Denavit-Hartenberg transformation matrix. T = Rz(θ) * Tz(d) * Tx(a) * Rx(α)
      Parameters:
      theta - Joint angle (radians)
      d - Link offset
      a - Link length
      alpha - Link twist (radians)
      Returns:
      4x4 transformation matrix (row-major)

    • multiplyMatrices

      public static double[][] multiplyMatrices(double[][] A, double[][] B)
      Multiplies two 4x4 matrices.

    • getPosition

      public static double[] getPosition(double[][] T)
      Extracts position from transformation matrix.

    • jacobian2Link

      public static double[][] jacobian2Link(double L1, double L2, double theta1, double theta2)
      Jacobian for 2-link planar arm (velocity kinematics). J = [dx/dθ1, dx/dθ2; dy/dθ1, dy/dθ2]

    • trapezoidalProfile

      public static double trapezoidalProfile(double t, double totalTime, double accelTime, double startPos, double endPos)
      Trapezoidal velocity profile for trajectory planning. Returns position at time t.

    • cubicTrajectory

      public static double cubicTrajectory(double t, double totalTime, double startPos, double endPos)
      Cubic polynomial trajectory. θ(t) = a0 + a1*t + a2*t² + a3*t³ With zero velocity at start and end.
